content:
I could able to launch the application with Cerner sandbox and similarly how to launch an appliction with EPIC sndbox.
I dont find any option to EHR launch from EPIC. kindly provide with any samples or references to follow up.
Epic documentation is at fhir.epic.com. You can ask Epic-specific question sending email to open@epic.com
Any Cerner related questions about sandbox may be answered on code.cerner.com or fhir.cerner.com
